title: Amority - Testing Heaven vol II [ New Creation Remix ]
description:
ABOUT THIS SONG & MYSELF

PS! DO NOT FORGET TO COMMENT IT TO MAKE IT MORE BETTER!


For me it took a lot of time more than 9 years to make something what I like and want to listen. I&#039;m "upgrading" this song (and others also) quite lot - this is the second vol of it.

.. Soon it will be third. I&#039;ll promise.

1998-1999 when I had only dial-up connection it was hard to get good samples so it was more than limited way to create music. Soon I will share them out here so u need to watch it. At that time dowloading was so slow that it took more than 1 hour so work like this was more harder than now. I need to thank all my friends [ fans :) ] who asked me to make new and good song.

.. So I made it. U can find I&#039;st version of that Heaven song, the first one was almost okay. Testing Heaven is my 13&#039;th song to create.

Website: www.canadien.se 

IMPORTANT! Pls let me know what I need to cut out or what I need to buy?


See&#039;ya,
Mel
